William Laurie Wagner

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: Gust Johnson
  3. Location of Family: Sutton, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Sutton, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 15
  7. Date of Birth: 1888-01-22, Bellafointe, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Aurora News Register, 3 January 1980; Clay County News, 31 January 1980; Sutton Register, 4 September 1902.
